description:
After escaping from the cargo ship, Daisuke and Kambe pursue Shigemaru and arrive at the old site of the 3rd Laboratory owned by the Kambe group, which is the source of all the mysteries. Daisuke confronts Kikuko, the head of the family, with his burning questions, but her answers force him to make a crucial decision. The truth behind the tension and conflict between the three generations of the Kambe family becomes clear.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: All That Glitters Is Not Gold
Kagayaku Mono Subete Kin ni Arazu
L`argent n`est pas tout ce qui brille
輝くものすべて金にあらず
